pages.speaker: player
lines: Deoxys is reacting to the meteorite... Would you like to bring the Deoxys in your party closer to the meteorite?

action: q.run_command('scoreboard players set ' + q.player.username + ' Temp 0');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy1');

pages.speaker: player
lines: Which Deoxys would you like to bring closer to the meteorite?

action: q.dialogue.set_page('buy2');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s Temp 1');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy2');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s Temp 2');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy2');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s Temp 3');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy2');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s Temp 4');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy2');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s Temp 5');
q.dialogue.set_page('buy2');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' run scoreboard players set @s Temp 6');

pages.speaker: player
lines: And what kind of style were you thinking of? Our trims are unparalleled in the Kalos region!

pages.speaker: player
lines: Deoxys has changed to have superior stats for attacking!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=1}] run pokeedit 1 meteorite_forme=attack');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=2}] run pokeedit 2 meteorite_forme=attack');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=3}] run pokeedit 3 meteorite_forme=attack');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=4}] run pokeedit 4 meteorite_forme=attack');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=5}] run pokeedit 5 meteorite_forme=attack');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=6}] run pokeedit 6 meteorite_forme=attack');
q.dialogue.close();

pages.speaker: player
lines: Deoxys has changed to have superior stats when defending!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=1}] run pokeedit 1 meteorite_forme=defense');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=2}] run pokeedit 2 meteorite_forme=defense');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=3}] run pokeedit 3 meteorite_forme=defense');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=4}] run pokeedit 4 meteorite_forme=defense');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=5}] run pokeedit 5 meteorite_forme=defense');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=6}] run pokeedit 6 meteorite_forme=defense');
q.dialogue.close();

pages.speaker: player
lines: Deoxys has changed to have increased Speed!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=1}] run pokeedit 1 meteorite_forme=speed');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=2}] run pokeedit 2 meteorite_forme=speed');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=3}] run pokeedit 3 meteorite_forme=speed');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=4}] run pokeedit 4 meteorite_forme=speed');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=5}] run pokeedit 5 meteorite_forme=speed');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=6}] run pokeedit 6 meteorite_forme=speed');
q.dialogue.close();

pages.speaker: player
lines: Deoxys has changed to have balanced stats!

action: q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=1}] run pokeedit 1 meteorite_forme=normal');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=2}] run pokeedit 2 meteorite_forme=normal');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=3}] run pokeedit 3 meteorite_forme=normal');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=4}] run pokeedit 4 meteorite_forme=normal');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=5}] run pokeedit 5 meteorite_forme=normal');
q.run_command('execute as ' + q.player.username + ' if entity @s[scores={Temp=6}] run pokeedit 6 meteorite_forme=normal');
q.dialogue.close();
